statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT electricity_reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT electricity_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE electricity_reading > 100;
SELECT AVG(electricity_reading) FROM sensor_data;
SELECT meter_id, electricity_reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE electricity_reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND electricity_reading BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY meter_id ASC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(electricity_reading) AS avg_reading, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM sensor_data GROUP BY DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT meter_id, MAX(electricity_reading) AS max_reading, MIN(electricity_reading) AS min_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY meter_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT meter_id, CONCAT('Reading:', electricity_reading) AS reading_info FROM sensor_data WHERE meter_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY meter_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meter_data
SELECT power_consumption, voltage FROM energy_meter_data
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, power_consumption FROM energy_meter_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM meter_location
SELECT location_name, city FROM meter_location
SELECT * FROM energy_meter_data WHERE power_consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, power_consumption, voltage FROM energy_meter_data WHERE voltage < 220 AND current > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT m.meter_id, m.location_name, m.city, e.power_consumption, e.voltage FROM meter_location m INNER JOIN energy_meter_data e ON m.meter_id = e.meter_id WHERE e.timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND m.country = 'USA' ORDER BY e.timestamp DESC;

SELECT e.meter_id, e.timestamp, e.power_consumption, e.voltage, m.location_name, m.city FROM energy_meter_data e LEFT JOIN meter_location m ON e.meter_id = m.meter_id WHERE e.current < 10 AND m.state = 'California' ORDER BY e.timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(power_consumption) AS avg_power_consumption, MAX(voltage) AS max_voltage, MIN(current) AS min_current FROM energy_meter_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM energy_meters;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_meters ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM meter_readings WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT meter_id, latitude, longitude FROM meter_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0;
SELECT id, meter_id, timestamp, status FROM meter_readings WHERE status = 'OK';
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT id, meter_id, timestamp FROM meter_readings WHERE status = 'OK' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT meter_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_meters GROUP BY meter_id
SELECT meter_locations.*, meter_readings.reading FROM meter_locations INNER JOIN meter_readings ON meter_locations.meter_id = meter_readings.meter_id
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY voltage ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_meters;
SELECT location, install_date FROM energy_meters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM energy_meters WHERE install_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_data.timestamp, sensor_data.value FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT reports.report_date, anomalies.issue, anomalies.severity FROM reports INNER JOIN anomalies ON reports.data_id = anomalies.data_id ORDER BY severity DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters;
SELECT location FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_id = 3;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM energy_meters WHERE location LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT meter_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY meter_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location, install_date FROM energy_meters WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT manufacturer, location, install_date FROM energy_meters WHERE location = 'Office Building';
SELECT * FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT meter_id, consumption, voltage FROM energy_readings WHERE voltage > 220 AND consumption > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters ORDER BY install_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT meter_id, location, manufacturer FROM energy_meters WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT reading_timestamp, consumption, voltage FROM energy_readings WHERE consumption > 50 AND voltage < 220 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT error_id, meter_id, error_timestamp, error_message FROM meter_errors WHERE error_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC
SELECT stat_id, meter_id, total_readings, avg_consumption FROM meter_statistics ORDER BY avg_consumption DESC LIMIT 5
